greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(1) = 0, and for n > 1, a(n) = position of Stern polynomial B(n,x) among the irreducible/reducible Stern polynomials.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10001
formula: If A283991(n) = 1 then a(n) = A283992(n), otherwise a(n) = A283993(n).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Mar 20 2017
